main_definition: To separate or split something into parts, typically in the context of numbers or groups.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To share out among people or things evenly.
meanings_and_examples.example: After dividing 12 candies equally among 4 children, each child gets 3 candies.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To split something into separate pieces.
meanings_and_examples.example: The wooden plank was divided in half with a saw to create two smaller boards.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In mathematics, referring to the operation of separating a number into its component parts.
meanings_and_examples.example: To divide 15 by 3 gives us an answer of 5.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To cause a separation or disagreement between people or groups.
meanings_and_examples.example: Their different opinions led to the division of the committee into opposing factions.
